amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for the FBI by $25 million and reduce funding for administrative provisions of the Legal Services Corporation by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for the FBI by $25 million and to reduce funding for administrative provisions of the Legal Services Corporation by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pittenger amendment (A026) Failed by recorded vote: 163 - 263 (Roll no. 275).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Pittenger amendment (A026) Failed by recorded vote: 163 - 263 (Roll no. 275).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A026) offered by Mr. Pittenger.
